duties_responsibilities.duty: Implement and monitor regional and district standards for Network Implementation and Operations (NI\u0026O) teams.
Coordinate implementation and training efforts across district teams to ensure consistent usage across all regions.
Develop project plans and report performance results in relation to Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) and Objectives and Key Results (OKRs).
Collaborate with district-based teams to deliver corporate objectives of Ease, Speed, and Predictability (ESP).
Maintain open communication across all functional teams and work as a unit with consistency while supporting the regional NI\u0026O organization.
Lead implementation and training of systems, tools, processes, and procedures for teams throughout the region.
Develop district OKRs that drive national and regional KPI results.
Develop reports to identify and assess areas of opportunity for improved process efficiencies and performance.
Monitor performance trends to drive meeting or exceeding targeted results.
Engage regional cross-functional teams and national Business Process Improvement teams for process improvement and OKR/KPI attainment.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree or equivalent experience required. Master of Business Administration preferred.
